sentence.Network_en: That thing has already killed half my men and got the other half scared shitless.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个东西已经杀了一半我的手下把另外一半吓的也够呛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: shiftless 无志气的shitless 极度shoeless 无鞋的
He was scared shitless ., 他吓得屁滚尿流.

list.abs: Keep sharp 保持警觉He sounds scared shitless 他吓的屁滚尿流They need to haul ass 他们要行动快点

entry.def: If someone says that they are scared shitless or bored shitless, they are emphasizing that they are extremely scared or bored.

auth_sentence.content: If you were scared shitless, have the courage to write it that way.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you were scared shitless, have the courage to write it that way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you were scared shitless, have the courage to write it that way.

auth_sentence.content: Bailey has married nice, stupid, computer-gaming Constable Sean and is, already, bored "shitless" by him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bailey has married nice, stupid, computer-gaming Constable Sean and is, already, bored "shitless" by him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bailey has married nice, stupid, computer-gaming Constable Sean and is, already, bored "shitless" by him.

auth_sentence.content: "I was scared shitless, but I learned my lesson," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I was scared shitless, but I learned my lesson," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I was scared shitless, but I learned my lesson," he said.
